naslov: Prekrasna kuća s bazenom 125 m2 + okućnica 757 m2, Istra (prodaja)
opis: Prekrasna prizemnica u prirodi Otkrijte ekskluzivno naselje modernih vila, smještenih u idiličnom prirodnom okruženju, koje predstavlja savršenu simbiozu luksuza, privatnosti i povezanosti s prirodom, naglašavajući kvalitetan životni stil. U ovom naselju prodaje se atraktivna prizemnica s 125 m² stambenog prostora i 930 m² zemljišta, idealna za one koji traže funkcionalnost i eleganciju. Nekretnina sadrži tri spavaće sobe, uključujući master sobu s privatnom kupaonicom i garderobom, dok dvije dodatne sobe imaju zajedničku kupaonicu, plus dodatnu kupaonicu i toalet za goste, pružajući optimalan prostor za život i privatnost. Prostrana kuhinja s modernim otokom savršeno se spaja s dnevnim boravkom i blagovaonicom, čime se stvara otvoreni i svijetli prostor obasjan prirodnim svjetlom. Radni prostor sa ugradbenim ormarom, smješten u središtu kuće, zajedno s tehničkom prostorijom za rublje, osigurava funkcionalnost i organiziranost. Kuća je u potpunosti završena krajem lipnja 2024. Vanjski prostor obuhvaća prostranu terasu s pergolom i veliki vrt, idealne za opuštanje i druženje, dok bazen dimenzija 9x3 metra dodaje element luksuza i privlačnosti. Ova kuća predstavlja izvrsnu priliku za investiciju u novu gradnju, kombinirajući udobnost modernog življenja s blizinom prirode. Ova vila nudi kvalitetu s filtriranom i omekšanom vodom, kuhinjom opremljenom s naprednim uređajima poput hladnjaka s ledomatom, vinotekom, indukcijskom pločom te mikrovalnom i pećnicom. Interijer krasi raskošna dizajnerska rasvjeta, Vimar prekidači, ručno izrađeni namještaj od kvalitetnog drva, dok je sustav grijanja i hlađenja visoko efikasan zahvaljujući Viessmann toplinskoj pumpi i Mitsubishi klima uređajima. Bazen s hidromasažom i slanom vodom te elegancija interijera (dizajn poznate akademske umjetnice) i eksterijera dodatno ističu ekskluzivnost vile. Mjesto: Prva konoba/restoran nalazi se nedaleko od same kuće. Trgovina je udaljena 1500 m. Površina nekretnine: 125 m2 Površina okućnice: 757 m2 Spavaće sobe: 3 Energetski razred: A+ Grijanje: Podno grijanje Klima uređaj Sadržaji: Satelitska televizija Internet Parkirna mjesta: 4 Udaljenost od mora: 10000 m Vila je novoizgrađena, u potpunosti opremljena i kao takva se prodaje. Godina izgradnje: 2024 godina Za sva pitanja kontakt telefon: 098 / 915 - 5643 (Ivan) LORETA NEKRETNINE Loreta Usluge Office: Tel: 01/3866-844 Zagrebačka avenija 100a, 10 000 Zagreb www.loreta-nekretnine.com Beautiful   single  -  storey   house   in   nature   Discover   an   exclusive   resort   of   modern   villas  ,   located   in   an   idyllic   natural   environment  ,   which   represents   the   perfect   symbiosis   of   luxury  ,   privacy   and   connection   with   nature  ,   emphasizing   a   quality   lifestyle  .   In   this   settlement  ,   an   attractive   single  -  storey   house   with   125   m  ²   of   living   space   and   930   m  ²   of   land   is   for   sale  ,   ideal   for   those   looking   for   functionality   and   elegance  . The   property   contains   three   bedrooms  ,   including   a   master   room   with   a   private   bathroom   and   dressing   room  ,   while   two   additional   bedrooms   have   a   shared   bathroom  ,   plus   an   additional   bathroom   and   guest   toilet  ,   providing   an   optimal   space   for   living   and   privacy  .   The   spacious   kitchen   with   a   modern   island   blends   perfectly   with   the   living   room   and   dining   room  ,   creating   an   open   and   bright   space   illuminated   by   natural   light  .   A   workspace   with   a   built  -  in   wardrobe  ,   located   in   the   center   of   the   house  ,   together   with   a   technical   laundry   room  ,   ensures   functionality   and   organization  . The   house   was   completely   completed   at   the   end   of   June   2024  .   The   outdoor   area   includes   a   spacious   terrace   with   a   pergola   and   a   large   garden  ,   ideal   for   relaxing   and   socializing  ,   while   the   9x3   meter   swimming   pool   adds   an   element   of   luxury   and   appeal  .   This   house   represents   an   excellent   opportunity   to   invest   in   new   construction  ,   combining   the   comfort   of   modern   living   with   the   proximity   of   nature  . This   villa   offers   quality   with   filtered   and   softened   water  ,   a   kitchen   equipped   with   advanced   appliances   such   as   a   refrigerator   with   an   ice   maker  ,   a   wine   cooler  ,   an   induction   hob  ,   and   a   microwave   and   oven  .   The   interior   is   adorned with   luxurious   designer   lighting  ,   Vimar   switches  ,   handmade   furniture   made   of   quality   wood  ,   while   the   heating   and   cooling   system   is   highly   efficient   thanks   to   the   Viessmann   heat   pump   and   Mitsubishi   air   conditioners  . The   pool   with   hydromassage   and   salt   water   and   the   elegance   of   the   interior   (  designed   by   a   famous   academic   artist  )   and   exterior   further   emphasize   the   exclusivity   of the   villa  . Place:   The   first   tavern  /  restaurant   is   located   not   far   from   the   house  . A   shop   is   1500   m   away  . Property   size  :   125   m2 Total   plot   area  :   757   m2 Bedrooms  :   3 Energy   class  :   A+ Heating  :   Underfloor   heating Air conditioner   Facilities: Satellite   TV Internet Parking   spaces  :   4 Distance   from   Sea  :   10000   m The   villa   is   newly   built  ,   fully   equipped   and   as   such   is   for   sale  .
